title: JASHN THE BANQUET
description: Experience grandeur and elegance at JASHN THE BANQUET, our premier banquet hall perfect for weddings, corporate events, and grand celebrations. With state-of-the-art facilities and luxurious ambiance.
listDescription: Experience grandeur and elegance at JASHN THE BANQUET, our premier banquet hall perfect for weddings, corporate events, and grand celebrations.
detailDescription:
JASHN THE BANQUET is our flagship venue designed to host the most memorable celebrations. This spacious and elegantly designed banquet hall can accommodate large gatherings with style and sophistication. Featuring high ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and modern sound systems, it provides the perfect backdrop for weddings, anniversaries, corporate galas, and social events.

Our dedicated event planning team ensures every detail is meticulously executed, from custom decor to gourmet catering. The venue includes advanced lighting systems, professional audio-visual equipment, and flexible seating arrangements to suit your specific needs. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, JASHN THE BANQUET delivers an unforgettable experience.

title: BLANCO THE POOL SIDE
description: A stunning poolside venue offering a perfect blend of outdoor elegance and modern amenities. Ideal for daytime celebrations, pool parties, and intimate gatherings with a refreshing ambiance.
listDescription: A stunning poolside venue offering a perfect blend of outdoor elegance and modern amenities. Ideal for daytime celebrations and pool parties.
detailDescription:
BLANCO THE POOL SIDE creates a magical outdoor experience with its beautiful poolside setting and contemporary design. This versatile venue is perfect for daytime celebrations, pool parties, brunches, and intimate gatherings. The open-air space features elegant cabanas, comfortable seating arrangements, and direct pool access, creating a relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere.

With natural lighting, lush greenery, and the sparkling pool as a backdrop, every event becomes memorable. The venue includes shaded areas, poolside bar facilities, and flexible catering options. Whether you're hosting a summer party, engagement celebration, or corporate lunch, BLANCO THE POOL SIDE offers a refreshing and elegant setting.

title: CP BANQUET AND CONVENTION
description: Our largest and most versatile convention center designed for corporate events, conferences, exhibitions, and large-scale gatherings. Equipped with cutting-edge technology and flexible spaces.
listDescription: Our largest and most versatile convention center designed for corporate events, conferences, exhibitions, and large-scale gatherings.
detailDescription:
CP BANQUET AND CONVENTION is a world-class facility designed to meet the demands of modern corporate events and large-scale gatherings. This expansive venue features multiple flexible spaces that can be configured for conferences, exhibitions, trade shows, product launches, and corporate meetings. With state-of-the-art audio-visual technology, high-speed internet, and professional presentation equipment, it's the ideal choice for business events.

The venue includes breakout rooms, registration areas, networking spaces, and full catering facilities. Our experienced event management team ensures seamless execution of complex multi-day conferences. With ample parking, easy accessibility, and professional service, CP BANQUET AND CONVENTION sets the standard for corporate hospitality.

title: DELIBERATION MEETING HALL
description: An elegant and intimate meeting hall designed for board meetings, seminars, workshops, and executive gatherings. Features premium furnishings and advanced conferencing technology.
listDescription: An elegant and intimate meeting hall designed for board meetings, seminars, workshops, and executive gatherings.
detailDescription:
DELIBERATION MEETING HALL offers a sophisticated and professional setting for important business meetings, board discussions, executive seminars, and strategic planning sessions. The venue combines classic elegance with modern technology to create an environment conducive to productive dialogue and decision-making.

Featuring premium boardroom-style seating, advanced video conferencing capabilities, and soundproof walls for privacy, this hall ensures confidentiality and comfort. The space includes smart boards, high-definition displays, and seamless connectivity options. With professional catering service, comfortable seating arrangements, and dedicated technical support, DELIBERATION MEETING HALL provides the perfect setting for serious business discussions.

title: THE VELVET ROOM
description: An exclusive and luxurious private room perfect for intimate celebrations, VIP events, and sophisticated gatherings. Features opulent decor, premium amenities, and personalized service.
listDescription: An exclusive and luxurious private room perfect for intimate celebrations, VIP events, and sophisticated gatherings.
detailDescription:
THE VELVET ROOM represents the pinnacle of luxury and exclusivity. This intimate venue is designed for discerning clients seeking an extraordinary setting for VIP events, intimate celebrations, private dinners, and elite social gatherings. The room features opulent velvet furnishings, crystal chandeliers, rich color schemes, and artisanal details that create an atmosphere of refined elegance.

Every element has been carefully curated to provide an exceptional experience, from premium bar service to gourmet dining options. The venue offers complete privacy, personalized service, and attention to detail that exceeds expectations. Whether hosting a private dinner party, engagement celebration, or exclusive corporate event, THE VELVET ROOM delivers an unforgettable and sophisticated experience.

title: CP GREEN - THE LAWN
description: A sprawling outdoor lawn venue surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for weddings, outdoor celebrations, and nature-themed events. Offers a picturesque setting under the open sky.
listDescription: A sprawling outdoor lawn venue surrounded by lush greenery, perfect for weddings, outdoor celebrations, and nature-themed events.
detailDescription:
CP GREEN - THE LAWN is a magnificent outdoor venue that brings nature's beauty to your celebration. This expansive lawn area is surrounded by meticulously maintained gardens, creating a picturesque setting for outdoor weddings, garden parties, and nature-themed events. The natural backdrop of greenery and open skies provides a romantic and refreshing atmosphere.

The venue offers flexible setup options with elegant marquees, beautiful arches, and natural pathways. Our event planning team specializes in creating stunning outdoor ceremonies and receptions that blend seamlessly with the natural environment. With covered areas for protection, full catering facilities, and beautiful landscaping, CP GREEN - THE LAWN transforms your outdoor celebration into a magical experience.

title: LOST AND FOUND CLUB
description: A vibrant and energetic entertainment venue perfect for parties, live performances, and nightlife events. Features modern sound systems, dynamic lighting, and a lively atmosphere.
listDescription: A vibrant and energetic entertainment venue perfect for parties, live performances, and nightlife events.
detailDescription:
LOST AND FOUND CLUB is the ultimate destination for entertainment and nightlife. This dynamic venue combines cutting-edge technology with a vibrant atmosphere to create unforgettable experiences. Featuring state-of-the-art sound systems, dynamic LED lighting, and a professional DJ setup, it's perfect for parties, live music events, themed nights, and social celebrations.

The club offers multiple levels, VIP areas, a fully-stocked bar, and flexible space configurations. Whether hosting a private party, corporate celebration, or special event, the venue adapts to your needs. With professional event management, talented DJs and performers, and a lively ambiance, LOST AND FOUND CLUB ensures your event is the talk of the town.
